choose.when: SELECT M2.MENU_ID name,M2.MENU_NAME value FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MENU_ID FROM COMMON_OPTION_SET_MENU WHERE PID = #{pid}) M1 LEFT JOIN SYS_MENU M2 ON M2.MENU_ID = M1.MENU_ID
choose.otherwise: SELECT M2.MENU_ID name,M2.MENU_NAME value FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PID FROM COMMON_OPTION_SET_MENU) M1 LEFT JOIN SYS_MENU M2 ON M2.MENU_ID = M1.PID

mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM COMMON_OPTION_SET t1 LEFT JOIN COMMON_OPTION_SET_OPTION t2 on t2.CODE = T1.OPTION_CODE WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId} and ATTR = #{attr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMON_OPTION_SET (MENU_ID, ATTR, OPTION_CODE) VALUES (#{menuId},#{attr},#{optionCode})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMON_OPTION_SET where MENU_ID = #{menuId} and ATTR = #{attr} and OPTION_CODE = #{optionCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMON_OPTION_SET_OPTION SET NAME = #{name} WHERE CODE = #{code}
